teaser: Are we prepared for a world where people print guns? We better be; Advances in 3D printing have led to difficult issues for law and government. In this episode we talk with Jonathan Zittrain, a law and computer science professor at Harvard and co-founder of the Berkman Center for Internet. He explains how 3D-printing technology is being used to make guns and gun parts, and explores how the do-it-yourself gun industry might be regulated in the future.
title: Marketplace Tech Report for Tuesday, September 4, 2012
itags: Marketplace Tech Report for Tuesday, September 4, 2012
